column6: What is Blade's father's endgame? Will Blade keep his gun-hand? Will the Tryana prophecy be fulfilled and, if so, at what cost? What is Dracula's dark secret?  All this...and the conclusion of Blade's origin.
column8: | penciller:Howard Chaykin | colorist:Edgar Delgado | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | writer:Marc Guggenheim | letterer:Rus Wooton
